name: Iron Sword
desc: Usually used more for cutting vegetables than enemies.

name: Slim Sword
desc: Lightweight and allows for more maneuverability. +2 Spd.

name: Steel Sword
desc: Folded one hundred times to give it an actual chance.

name: Silver Sword
desc: An especially strong blade. Very steep to commission.

name: Tanto
desc:
Favored by Outside World Assassins.

name: Killing Edge
desc: Used by seasoned duelists to end fights in one blow.

name: Zanbato
desc: Its large size ensures that it can split horses in half (metaphorically). Anti-Mounted.

name: Persecutor
desc: Magicbuster.

name: Bankuruwase

Prf Kogasa/Cirno. A somewhat ancient blade whisked away to Gensokyo. Grants "Sudden Upset".
Anti-Monstrous. Recurring.

name: Frostmourn
desc:
Prf Cirno. A fragile blade of ice that holds a lot of power.
Recurring. Magic.

name: Paired Blades

Prf Youmu. The gardener's two blades, Roukanken & Hakurouken.
Recurring. Grants Youmu access to an array of offensive combat arts and defensive abilities.

name: Rapier
desc:
A western sword suited for penetrating defenses. 
Anti-Mounted, Armorpiercing.

Prf Rinnosuke. Purportedly the legendary sword of Japan. Exceptionally weak. The blade calls for 5 souls...

name: Kusanagi?
Kusanagi?
Kusanagi
Tasouken
desc:
Prf Rinnosuke. The legendary sword of Japan, blessed by the heavens to cleave clouds.
+8 Spd, +6 Def, +6 Res. Cannot miss. Anti-Fliers, Anti-Monstrous. +30% to all growths.

name: Lancereaver
desc: Its unusual structure makes it perfect for hooking onto spears. Reaver.

name: Brave Sword
desc: Logically, double the swords means double the cuts. Brave.

desc: The things that cannot be cut by this blade are (almost) next to none!

name: Poison Sword

name: Iron Lance
desc: Hastily fashioned from a stick and a speartip.

desc: Used primarily as a tool for woodcarving, but can also be used as a weapon in a pinch.

desc: Poisons on contact

name: Maple Shield
desc: Standard issue for Tengu scouts. +4 Def when in inventory. Loses one durability per round of combat. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Forged Shield
desc: A reinforced shield forged only for elite soldiers. +6 Def when in inventory, but -3 Spd. Loses one durability per round of combat. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Kappatech Shield
desc: A marvel of innovation created limitedly in Kappa Workshops. +8 Def when in inventory, but -4 Spd. Loses one durability per round of combat. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Eye of Senri
desc: A mysterious crest from a parallel world. Use to make enemies more likely to target the user. Two uses per chapter. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Poppet
desc: +4 Res when in inventory. Loses one durability per round of combat. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Misfortune Amulet
desc: Blessed (or cursed) by the misfortune goddess herself. +6 Res when in inventory, but -3 Def. Loses one durability per round of combat. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time. Recurring.

name: Ankh
desc: Not going to protect you from debuffs. +8 Res when in inventory, but -4 Def. Loses one durability per round of combat. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Lucky Clover
desc: There's definitely something different about this one. Negates Crits. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: crit machine
desc: lol

name: Ciggie Box
desc: Sometimes being immortal is boring. Allows user access to the entire fire magic library, but they take severe damage in recoil for using a spell. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Lantern
desc: Offers +3 sight in the dark. +10 Hit. Only one accessory can be equipped at a time.

name: Gas Mask
desc: It says "Manufactured in 1916, Germany". Immune to poison. +2 Res. -2 sight in the dark. Only one accesory can be equipped at a time.

name: Stone Bowl
desc:
One of the Five Impossible Requests. Grants Stoneskinned.

name: Tengu Feathers

name: Medicine Box
desc: Can restore self or other units of any negative status effects. Only one accesory can be equipped at a time.

name: Tabula Rasa
desc: Clones the opponent's equipped magic weapon (e.g. Fire) and stores 1 use in the item. Once a magical weapon has been stolen 5 times, an infinite use copy of the weapon will be created in the Tabula Rasa.

desc:
Mildly spicy curry. Heals all HP, 50% chance to gain "Too Hot". Recurring.
"Too Hot"
- While active, unit gains Burning
- When hitting enemy, [20 + SKL]% chance to inflict Burning
